t:
In between sobs, I told the policeman everything I knew about the man who raped me, and what he did to me.




“I think it'll be better if we recreate the scene,” the policeman replied, pointing his gun towards me.
c:
“I'll help,” I heard a lady officer chime in.



#rape #complain #police #advantage #helpless #crime #recreate #sexualabuse
